card_text: Target 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to it. You can activate the following effect, based on which player controls the equipped monster;$N●You: During the Main Phase: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card.$N●Your opponent: Switch the equipped monster's current ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.$NYou can only use this effect of "Amaze Attraction Wonder Wheel" once per turn.
